info.author: Guido Goldstein
info.description:
MDP - the Majordomo Protocol
============================

An implementation in Python using pyzmq.

For the specification of see
<center>
<a href="http://rfc.zeromq.org/spec:7">MDP - the Majordomo Protocol<a/>
</center>

The implementation will make use of the more advanced parts of the
pyzmq bindings, namely ioloop and streams.

For this reason, most of the code will *not* look like the examples in
the guide. The examples in the guide are more or less direct
translations of the C examples. But pyzmq does offer more than a
shallow wrapper of the C API.


Authors
-------

 * Guido Goldstein (https://github.com/guidog)

 * Solomon Hykes (https://github.com/shykes)
info.name: pyzmq-mdp
info.summary: ZeroMQ MDP protocol in Python using pyzmq
info.html_description:
An implementation in Python using pyzmq.

For the specification of see <center> <a href=”http://rfc.zeromq.org/spec:7”>MDP - the Majordomo Protocol<a/> </center>

The implementation will make use of the more advanced parts of the pyzmq bindings, namely ioloop and streams.

For this reason, most of the code will not look like the examples in the guide. The examples in the guide are more or less direct translations of the C examples. But pyzmq does offer more than a shallow wrapper of the C API.

Authors
